name: Saucisse Sauteuse
description:
For the BBQ Game Jam, we created a game with the subject "Sausage". It is the story of a sausage that is not ready and fall in the BBQ coal. You have to reach the top to be safe before the hot coal burn you out. Have fun and enjoy ;)

Développement:
- Baptiste Remy
- Emile Sonneveld
- Eloi Strée
Graphisme: Thomas Schmitt
Musique et son: Joffrey Godart
